OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: Fetches Account & Contact Id from any given Account Id
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: VPL-GetAccountContactDCT

omniProcessElements.name: CheckAccountId
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "elementValueMap" : { "SetAccountId" : "=IF(%DRGetUserAccountId:UserAccountId% == NULL, Id, DRGetUserAccountId:UserAccountId)" }, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "label" : "SetValues1", "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "show" : null }

omniProcessElements.description: To identify the recordtype of the Account
omniProcessElements.name: CheckAccountRecordType
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "bundle" : "VPLGetAccountRecordType", "chainOnStep" : false, "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ { "element" : "CheckAccountId:SetAccountId", "inputParam" : "AccountId" } ], "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction2", "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: DRGetUserAccountId
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "bundle" : "dcGetUserDetails", "chainOnStep" : false, "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ ], "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction3", "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.description: Fetch Account Id & Contact Id from CustomerInteraction Object
omniProcessElements.name: GetCustomerInterationAccount
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "bundle" : "VPLGetCustomerInteractionAccount", "chainOnStep" : false, "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ { "element" : "Id", "inputParam" : "Id" } ], "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction1", "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.description: Response Action sends back the desired Account & contact Id
omniProcessElements.name: OutResponse
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "additionalOutput" : { "AccountId" : "=IF(%DRGetUserAccountId:UserAccountId% == NULL, Id, DRGetUserAccountId:UserAccountId)", "AccountRecordType" : "=%CheckAccountRecordType:AccountRecordType%", "BillDeliveryMethod" : "=%CheckAccountRecordType:AccountBillDeliveryMethod%", "ContactFirstName" : "=%DRGetUserAccountId:UserFirstName%", "ContactId" : "=IF(%DRGetUserAccountId:UserContactId% == NULL, NULL, DRGetUserAccountId:UserContactId)", "ContactLastName" : "=%DRGetUserAccountId:UserLastName%", "ContactUserId" : "=%DRGetUserAccountId:userId%", "ContextAccountName" : "=%CheckAccountRecordType:AccountName%" }, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "label" : "ResponseAction1", "responseDefaultData" : { }, "responseFormat" : "JSON", "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnFullDataJSON" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : true, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true, "vlcResponseHeaders" : { } }

OmniIntegrationProcedure.propertySetConfig: { "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "chainableActualTimeLimit" : null, "chainableCpuLimit" : 2000, "chainableDMLRowsLimit" : null, "chainableDMLStatementsLimit" : null, "chainableHeapSizeLimit" : null, "chainableQueriesLimit" : 50, "chainableQueryRowsLimit" : null, "chainableSoslQueriesLimit" : null, "columnsPropertyMap" : [ ], "description" : "", "includeAllActionsInResponse" : false, "labelPlural" : "", "labelSingular" : "", "linkToExternalObject" : "", "mockResponseMap" : { }, "nameColumn" : "", "queueableChainableCpuLimit" : 40000, "queueableChainableHeapSizeLimit" : 6, "queueableChainableQueriesLimit" : 120, "relationshipFieldsMap" : [ ], "rollbackOnError" : false, "trackingCustomData" : { }, "ttlMinutes" : 5 }
